data.author: Mitchel Spears

changelog.release_notes:
- Added watch meta info on shake (bluetooth and battery percentage)
- Updated aplite to sdk 3 bitmap blending, thus fixes some issues with some bitmaps

- Added support for Pebble Round
- Added black and white faces for color pebbles
- Changed style of config page to pebble slate
- Fix clockface alignment issue on aplite
-Added in the ability to change the rotation of the minute ring and hour face

Version 2.0!
- added in domestic face
- added in stone background
- choose between faces and backgrounds!

- Fix 12 o'clock bug
- Update menu icon
Fix memory leak associated with sun/moon bitmaps.

data.description:
The clocks from Majora's Mask, for your Pebble! Behaves just like in game, with the outer ring rotating to show the minutes, and the inner ring rotating to show the hour.

Configurable!
- Choose between two different clock faces: the Clock Town clock tower or the indoor clocks
- Choose between color or black and white for color scheme
- Change the background
- Change the rotation of the hour ring or clock face
- Show bluetooth and battery info on shake

More features coming soon!

Feel free to contact me through the support email for any feedback or suggestions!

latest_release.release_notes:
- Added watch meta info on shake (bluetooth and battery percentage)
- Updated aplite to sdk 3 bitmap blending, thus fixes some issues with some bitmaps

data.title: Termina Clock
